public.title: Register to the committee
public.description:
Do you want to register your project to the committee?
We just need you to connect to get started.

success.title: Thank you for applying
success.description: We have received your application. You can review and edit it until registration closes.

create.title: Select your project
create.description: Start by going through the details of your project. Should you wish to make any updates, please proceed to OnlyDust to edit your project information.

update.title: Your application
update.descriptionDate: You can edit your application until __date__.

voting.title: Your application
voting.description: Voting has begun. Your application can no longer be edited.

closed.title: Your application
closed.description: This committee is now closed for applications.

questions.title: Answer the following questions
questions.description: This will help our jury to allocate budget for this committee.

error.title: We can't find your application
error.description: Please try again or _contact us_ if the problem persists.

empty.title: Project has not applied
empty.description: This project didn't apply for the committee in time.

public.title: Vote in the committee
public.description:
Do you want to vote for projects in the committee?
We just need you to connect to get started.

private.title: Vote for your assigned projects
private.subtitle: 👋 Hello __name__, please find below the __projects__ projects to review for this month.
private.description:
Following your feedback, we have added metrics to help you judge projects. We don’t filter projects when they apply; we want to be permissionless.

Be careful; even with low metrics, you can find hidden gems (especially for new projects).
If you have a conflict of interest, don’t vote. A 0 is a non-vote. There is a conflict if you have invested or have a close relationship with a project (employee, employer, investor in your project, biggest customer, best friend, etc.)

The 4 criteria are here to help, but ultimately, we count the aggregate vote. So, if you have a very strong opinion, you can give only 5 or only 1, even if it doesn't match the reality of each criterion.

If you have a question, reach __link__ on TG.
We are here to help.

error.title: We can't find the committee
error.description: Please try again or _contact us_ if the problem persists.

error.title: We can't find the project
error.description: Please try again or _contact us_ if the problem persists.
